name: LuxuryNext Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: business-of-luxury, luxury-hospitality-brands, luxury-brands, bespoke-luxury-brands, international-luxury-brand-consulting, global-luxury-business, luxury-marketing, luxury-brands-in-india, luxury-industry-experts, luxury-brand-managers, luxury-media, bou
overview: LuxuryNext is a consulting company created specially to offer individual clients highly specialized services tailored to meet their requirements. We at LuxuryNext believe that there are no fixed solutions to a brands marketing, retailing and sales requirements. We specialize in understanding the brand and developing its brand equity and positioning.With its headquarters in New York and office in New Delhi, we specialize in assisting U.S., Indian and international clients with creative ideas on entering and establishing themselves in new and emerging markets in any part of the world. Our wide range of services include strategic planning, social media initiatives, brand positioning, CRM and PR. We work closely with the brand’s senior management and marketing teams and provide them creative solutions to increase their sales and market presence.
